source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: #9 Bake Extreme Fermentation Sourdough Bread

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway

items.headline: New method for extreme fermentation using "hands off" and extended ferments.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have an understanding of how to do a moderate to extreme fermentation of your dough.
Have an understanding of how to modify gluten using a long ferment, which makes the bread more flavorful and easier to digest.
You will learn how to modify your method to make really "sour" sourdough if that is what you want.

items.title: #5 Bake the Best Bagels

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway

items.headline: Take your bread baking skills to a new level with a variety of delicious sourdough and yeast bagels.
objectives_summary: Learn how to bake the best bagels!
Have a better understanding of the types of flour and ingredients that are best for baking bagels with.
Know how to make egg bagels, water bagels and hybrid bagels (bagels made with both sourdough and commercial yeast).

items.title: Mastering Sourdough Starters & Leavens
items.headline: From mystery to mastery. How to handle sourdough cultures like a pro.
objectives_summary: How to make organic sourdough starters.
How to feed your starter and keep it in top condition.
How to use your starter to make a leaven.

items.title: Online Pastry School - 1 Week Mastery Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Fourth Generation Pastry Chef, Twenty Five (25) Years Exp.
visible_instructors.name: Marco
visible_instructors.title: Marco Ropke

items.headline: Learn from Marco Ropke a fourth generation pastry chef with twenty five (25) years of international experience.
objectives_summary: Demystify the world of pastry! With the skill set learnt you will not just learn recipes, but learn methods and understanding behind pastry arts.
By the end of this course all of your friends and family will be raving about your pastry skills.
Know why things turn out right, and why they sometimes turn out wrong. Understand the science behind the pastry arts!

items.title: Master the Craft of Artisan Pizza
items.headline: Learn professional pizzarista techniques for making authentic, artisan pizza, in your domestic or wood fired oven.
objectives_summary: Make seven different kinds of pizza dough, including Napoletana, sourdough, heritage and gluten free.
Manage rising, proving and baking schedules.
Shape the dough like a pro.

items.title: Sourdough Bread Baking 102 - Exploration

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway

items.headline: Sourdough 102. Explore some of the techniques behind bread baking and learn to challenge baking methods.
objectives_summary: When this course is done, the student will learn to challenge standard ideas of baking methods and explore baking methods.
You will learn to wash gluten, see what gluten and starch looks like, test the suitability of the flour you are using to bake bread and more!
You will have several printable formulas for Ciabatta, sourdough pancakes and several hydration level sourdough breads.

items.title: Professional Barista Level 1 Cert. Program - Espresso Coffee

visible_instructors.job_title: Director at Umbria Coffee Roasters Canada
visible_instructors.name: Peter
visible_instructors.title: Peter Lee

items.headline: Getting Quality and Consistency with your Espresso & Specialty Coffee Drinks
objectives_summary: Simple easy ways to ensure the entire barista team is using the same techniques that ensure quality and consistency.
Skills needed to run operations of an espresso coffee bar in a café or other type of business that sells specialty coffees.
Knowledge and skills needed to be a proficient professional barista or coffee expert.

items.title: How To Be A Successful Bartender
items.headline: Online Bartending School: Secrets From a Working Bartender in Tribeca, New York City
objectives_summary: The habits and techniques needed to bartend at the highest Caliber
How to make the most popular drinks at the highest caliber of service
Everything that a bartender does, a bartender’s mindset and duties. The entire job not just making the drinks like other classes

items.title: Learn to Bake Panettone

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway

items.headline: Discover the method of how to bake one of the most loved holiday breads in the world.
objectives_summary: After taking this course you will have the knowledge to bake up your own Panettone.
You will learn to mix dough to development, when to add butter, how long to proof the dough etc.
You will learn how to make Lievito Madre and how to use it to leaven Panettone.

items.title: #6 Learn to Bake Magnificent Challah Bread

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway

items.headline: Baking Sourdough Challah or Traditional Challah Bread - It's Magnificent!
objectives_summary: Learn to bake various types of Challah, yeasted, hybrid and sourdough.
Discover a special technique for making bread really soft.
Watch a professional baker demonstrate many various braiding techniques.

items.title: How to Bake : Baking Basics - 6 Classic Bakes
items.headline: Learn how to master baking basics with 6 classic baking recipes made simple. Wow your friends and family!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to make 6 great baking classics
By the end of this course you will feel more confident in the kitchen
You will understand the ingredients and techniques needed in order to create a 6 baking classics

items.title: Pastel de Nata - Portuguese custard tarts for all levels!
items.headline: Bake Portugal's most iconic pastry with a 5th generation baker from Lisbon. With PRO tips for bakery level results!
objectives_summary: My award-winning recipe for authentic Portuguese Pastel de Nata (also known as Egg Tart or Custard Tart)
Puff pastry from scratch
Tricks and secrets to bake Pastel de Nata like professionals do (they aren't all the same!)

items.title: #3 Ancient Chinese Science & Art of Brewing Tea

visible_instructors.job_title: ITA Tea Master, Tea Author, Tea Artisan & Tea Hunter
visible_instructors.name: Shana
visible_instructors.title: Shana Zhang

items.headline: ITA Certified Course-Revolutionary Water Techniques, 5 Elements, Ancient Chinese Medicine Secret and Art of Tea Brewing
objectives_summary: Ancient Chinese Science & Art of Brewing Tea
Use traditional KungFu tea brewing style to brew out a healthiest cup of tea
Mastering the deepest essence of the ancient Chinese tea ceremony

items.title: Cigars - From novice to expert in one course

visible_instructors.job_title: Specialist of Spirits, Certified Sommelier,  Mixologist
visible_instructors.name: Carlos
visible_instructors.title: Carlos Batista

items.headline: Guidance in Selection, Flavors & Enjoying life's finer things.
objectives_summary: An in-depth understanding of cigars including their history, how they’re made, and tobacco growing regions.
Understanding the different cigar styles and sizes.
How to cut cigars with various types of cutters, lighting & smoking.

items.title: Japanese Pastry Course #1 Japanese Short cake
items.headline: Learn how to make the most popular dessert in Japan, basic techniques of baking sponge cake, frosting and decorating.
objectives_summary: Become an expert at baking amazing Japanese short cake which is the most popular cake in Japan!
Find the secret of baking the classic fluffy Japanese sponge cake.
Learn to make perfect whipped cream called "Crème Chantilly".

items.title: The Complete Guide to Cake Fillings
items.headline: Learn how to create cake fillings of many textures and flavors.  Perfect for bakers and cake decorators!
objectives_summary: Become creative with interesting flavor and texture combinations.
Practice basic kitchen techniques such as separating eggs, weighing with a digital scale, and proper knife handling.
Make a wide variety of fillings for cakes.
